description: Returns a list of all the MSK clusters in the current Region.

nested_items.name: ClusterInfoList
nested_items.description: Information on each of the MSK clusters in the response.

nested_items.name: ActiveOperationArn
nested_items.description: Arn of active cluster operation.

nested_items.name: BrokerNodeGroupInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the broker nodes.

nested_items.name: BrokerAZDistribution
nested_items.description: The distribution of broker nodes across Availability Zones. This is an optional parameter. If you don't specify it, Amazon MSK gives it the value DEFAULT. You can also explicitly set this parameter to the value DEFAULT. No other values are currently allowed.

nested_items.name: ClientSubnets
nested_items.description: The list of subnets to connect to in the client virtual private cloud (VPC). AWS creates elastic network interfaces inside these subnets. Client applications use elastic network interfaces to produce and consume data. Client subnets can't occupy the Availability Zone with ID use use1-az3.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon EC2 instances to use for Apache Kafka brokers. The following instance types are allowed: kafka.m5.large, kafka.m5.xlarge, kafka.m5.2xlarge, kafka.m5.4xlarge, kafka.m5.12xlarge, and kafka.m5.24xlarge.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: The AWS security groups to associate with the elastic network interfaces in order to specify who can connect to and communicate with the Amazon MSK cluster. If you don't specify a security group, Amazon MSK uses the default security group associated with the VPC.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StorageInfo
nested_items.description: Contains information about storage volumes attached to MSK broker nodes.

nested_items.name: EbsStorageInfo
nested_items.description: EBS volume information.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedThroughput
nested_items.description: EBS volume provisioned throughput information.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Provisioned throughput is enabled or not.

nested_items.name: VolumeThroughput
nested_items.description: Throughput value of the EBS volumes for the data drive on each kafka broker node in MiB per second.

nested_items.name: VolumeSize
nested_items.description: The size in GiB of the EBS volume for the data drive on each broker node.

nested_items.name: ConnectivityInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the broker access configuration.

nested_items.name: PublicAccess
nested_items.description: Public access control for brokers.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The value DISABLED indicates that public access is turned off. SERVICE_PROVIDED_EIPS indicates that public access is turned on.

nested_items.name: VpcConnectivity
nested_items.description: VPC connectivity access control for brokers.

nested_items.name: ClientAuthentication
nested_items.description: Includes all client authentication information for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: SASL/SCRAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: SASL/IAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: TLS authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: ZoneIds
nested_items.description: The list of zoneIds for the cluster in the virtual private cloud (VPC).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ClientAuthentication
nested_items.description: Includes all client authentication information.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: SASL/SCRAM authentication is enabled or not.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether IAM access control is enabled.

nested_items.name: CertificateAuthorityArnList
nested_items.description: List of ACM Certificate Authority ARNs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether you want to turn on or turn off TLS authentication.

nested_items.name: Unauthenticated
nested_items.description: Contains information about unauthenticated traffic to the cluster.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether you want to turn on or turn off unauthenticated traffic to your cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterName
nested_items.description: The name of the cluster.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the cluster was created.

nested_items.name: CurrentBrokerSoftwareInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the version of software currently deployed on the Apache Kafka brokers in the cluster.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration used for the cluster. This field isn't visible in this preview release.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the configuration to use. This field isn't visible in this preview release.

nested_items.name: KafkaVersion
nested_items.description: The version of Apache Kafka.

nested_items.name: CurrentVersion
nested_items.description: The current version of the MSK cluster.

nested_items.name: EncryptionInfo
nested_items.description: Includes all encryption-related information.

nested_items.name: EncryptionAtRest
nested_items.description: The data-volume encryption details.

nested_items.name: DataVolumeKMSKeyId
nested_items.description: The ARN of the AWS KMS key for encrypting data at rest. If you don't specify a KMS key, MSK creates one for you and uses it.

nested_items.name: EncryptionInTransit
nested_items.description: The details for encryption in transit.

nested_items.name: ClientBroker
nested_items.description: Indicates the encryption setting for data in transit between clients and brokers. The following are the possible values.

nested_items.name: InCluster
nested_items.description: When set to true, it indicates that data communication among the broker nodes of the cluster is encrypted. When set to false, the communication happens in plaintext.

nested_items.name: EnhancedMonitoring
nested_items.description: Specifies which metrics are gathered for the MSK cluster. This property has the following possible values: DEFAULT, PER_BROKER, PER_TOPIC_PER_BROKER, and PER_TOPIC_PER_PARTITION. For a list of the metrics associated with each of these levels of monitoring, see Monitoring.

nested_items.name: OpenMonitoring
nested_items.description: Settings for open monitoring using Prometheus.

nested_items.name: Prometheus
nested_items.description: Prometheus settings.

nested_items.name: JmxExporter
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter.

nested_items.name: EnabledInBroker
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter.

nested_items.name: NodeExporter
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter.

nested_items.name: EnabledInBroker
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter.

nested_items.name: NumberOfBrokerNodes
nested_items.description: The number of broker nodes in the cluster.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the cluster. The possible states are ACTIVE, CREATING, DELETING, FAILED, HEALING, MAINTENANCE, REBOOTING_BROKER, and UPDATING.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ZookeeperConnectString
nested_items.description: The connection string to use to connect to the Apache ZooKeeper cluster.

nested_items.name: ZookeeperConnectStringTls
nested_items.description: The connection string to use to connect to zookeeper cluster on Tls port.

nested_items.name: StorageMode
nested_items.description: This controls storage mode for supported storage tiers.

nested_items.name: CustomerActionStatus
nested_items.description: Determines if there is an action required from the customer.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The paginated results marker. When the result of a ListClusters operation is truncated, the call returns NextToken in the response. To get another batch of clusters, provide this token in your next request.
